newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nissho Iwai denies report on S.Africa metals plant.
newsitem.headline: Nissho Iwai denies report on S.Africa metals plant.

text.p: Japan's Nissho Iwai Corp on Wednesday denied a South African newspaper report that it planned to invest in a non-ferrous metal refinery in South Africa.
A Nissho official said the company had no concrete plans to invest in a refinery in South Africa, although it formed a chrome joint venture with Samancor Ltd earlier this year.
The Business Report newspaper in Johannesburg said on Tuesday the Japanese company planned a major investment in a non-ferrous metal refinery, possibly a nickel refinery, in South Africa.
